entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with freezing rain. Temperature rising to zero by morning.

entry.title: Thursday: Showers or drizzle. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing rain and rain showers changing to rain showers or drizzle in the morning then to snow late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High plus 3. Forecast issued 10:51 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
